titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the rehabilitation credit to allow such credit to be taken in one taxable year.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the rehabilitation credit to allow such credit to be taken in one taxable year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill allows the full amount of the 20% rehabilitation tax credit to be taken in one taxable year (currently, spread over five years).
